class.name: AudioStreamPlaybackSoundfont
class.brief_description: Playback instance for [AudioStreamSoundfontPlayer] with direct note and channel control.
class.description: [AudioStreamPlaybackSoundfont] is the playback class instantiated by [AudioStreamSoundfontPlayer]. It renders audio from a SoundFont2 synthesizer and accepts live note-on / note-off commands. All control methods are thread-safe - commands are queued and processed on the audio thread.

method.name: control_change
method.description: Sends a MIDI Control Change message on [param channel].

method.name: note_off
method.description: Stops a playing note. [param key] and [param channel] must match a previous [method note_on] call.

method.name: note_off_all
method.description: Immediately stops all playing notes on all channels.

method.name: note_on
method.description: Starts playing a note. [param key] is a MIDI note number (0–127, where 60 = Middle C). [param velocity] is the volume (0.0–1.0). [param channel] selects the MIDI channel (0–15).

method.name: pitch_bend
method.description: Sends a pitch bend. [param pitch_wheel] ranges from 0 to 16383 (center = 8192).

method.name: set_preset
method.description: Changes the instrument (preset) on [param channel]. Set [param drums] to [code]true[/code] for percussion (bank 128).
